description: Marks an actor who is actively penetrating another entity's asshole, preventing conflicting genital actions.

being_fucked_entity_id.description: The ID of the entity being anally penetrated

initiated.description: Whether this entity initiated the anal penetration

consented.description: Whether the penetrating entity consents to continue the interaction

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'being_fucked_entity_id' for the entity being anally penetrated.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. Very high priority (82) for highly explicit sexual act, higher than oral sex (80).
